DOC.brief_summary: There will be significant differences between control and experimental group after the moxibustion intervention as to, subjective physical symptoms and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Self-Moxibustion Therapy on Subjective Physical Symptoms and Health-related Quality of Life of the Elderly. The Effects of Self-Moxibustion Therapy
DOC.criteria: Male and female older adults age between 6585 Agree to participate and sign for the trail after understanding of study purpose, and method. Able to answer for questions by verbally or literally Able to participate in 2weeks after followup Having physical disorder such as thyroids, severe heart disease, dietetic mellitus, severe liver disease, allergy Subjects who can not attend more than 3 times of intervention session Subjects who are eligible by the decision of investigator
